images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual for the email campaign, capturing the essence of Thailand in autumn with a vibrant beach scene, palm trees, and cultural landmarks.
AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and discounts in the email, encouraging users to take advantage of the deals.
AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and discounts in the email, encouraging users to take advantage of the deals.
AI-selected These promotional icons will highlight special offers and discounts in the email, encouraging users to take advantage of the deals.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header of the email to establish brand identity and trust with the audience.
AI-selected These decorative illustrations will enhance the email's visual appeal, providing context about Thailand's rich culture and attractions.
AI-selected These decorative illustrations will enhance the email's visual appeal, providing context about Thailand's rich culture and attractions.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: vibrant beaches, warm sea, exotic cuisine, and Buddhist temples

assetRequirements.purpose: showcase the beauty of Thailand's beaches and culture
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting serene beach scenes and cultural landmarks

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Откройте для себя Таиланд этой осенью!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual for the email campaign, capturing the essence of Thailand in autumn with a vibrant beach scene, palm trees, and cultural landmarks.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
